name: Pongo Pong
description:
The original '72 Pong game was great. You know what's also great? Playing it in 4K, and having a choice of paddles, balls and levels!

Pongo Pong offers the old-school gameplay, combined with some upgrades. I tried to stay true to the old game, but still introduce some fun additions:

  • Customization: choose a paddle, and use it to become King of the Pongo Pong!
  • Challenge: Every opponent is different - not only in looks, but in speed and game style too!
  • Old-school Booklet with additional information
  • Music for menus and each individual level (composed by me #brag) 
  • Powerups, to make the game even more challenging

This game is in DEVELOPMENT. Please be aware that some things may not work as intended, and bugs are very possible.

I hope you have fun with it!
